special_notes.kanboard: Kanboard uses the 'kanboard' database in main PostgreSQL container
special_notes.test_databases: Test databases use tmpfs (RAM) for speed
special_notes.grafana: Includes dashboards, datasources, users, and all custom configurations (grafana.db)
special_notes.prometheus: Includes all metrics data, WAL files, and time series database
special_notes.n8n: Includes all workflows, credentials, and automation configurations
special_notes.rabbitmq: Includes message queues, exchanges, and broker configurations
special_notes.temporal: Includes workflow states and temporal service data
